member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_TOPOLOGY_ID
member.summary: The DISPLAYCONFIG_TOPOLOGY_ID enumeration specifies the type of display topology.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_TOPOLOGY_ID.DISPLAYCONFIG_TOPOLOGY_INTERNAL
member.summary: Indicates that the display topology is an internal configuration.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_TOPOLOGY_ID.DISPLAYCONFIG_TOPOLOGY_CLONE
member.summary: Indicates that the display topology is clone-view configuration.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_TOPOLOGY_ID.DISPLAYCONFIG_TOPOLOGY_EXTEND
member.summary: Indicates that the display topology is an extended configuration.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_TOPOLOGY_ID.DISPLAYCONFIG_TOPOLOGY_EXTERNAL
member.summary: Indicates that the display topology is an external configuration.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_TOPOLOGY_ID.DISPLAYCONFIG_TOPOLOGY_FORCE_UINT32
member.summary: Forces this enumeration to compile to 32 bits in size. Without this value, some compilers would allow this enumeration to compile to a size other than 32 bits. You should not use this value.
